mapper.insert: insert into cart(m_idx, p_idx, c_cnt) values(#{m_idx},#{p_idx},#{c_cnt})
mapper.select: select a.c_idx, a.c_cnt, a.m_idx, b.p_idx, b.p_name, b.p_img1,b.p_sale, b.p_price, a.c_cnt*(b.p_price*(100-b.p_sale)/100) as c_price from cart a join product b on a.p_idx = b.p_idx where m_idx= #{m_idx} order by a.c_idx desc

select SUBSTRING_INDEX(totalprice,'.', 1) as totalprice from (select sum(c_cnt*(p_price*(100-b.p_sale)/100)) as totalprice from cart a join product b on a.p_idx=b.p_idx join members d on a.m_idx=d.m_idx where a.m_idx=2) t
select count(*) from cart where m_idx=#{m_idx} and p_idx = #{p_idx}
select count(c_cnt) as cnt from cart where m_idx= #{m_idx}
mapper.update: update cart set c_cnt = #{c_cnt} where m_idx = #{m_idx} and c_idx = #{c_idx}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where c_idx = #{c_idx} and m_idx = #{m_idx}
